name: Sweet Home (Oriental Sunglasses)
description:
You are Hänsel or Gretel and you want to find your way home.

Movement: W, A, S, D + Mouse
Pickup/throw: left/right MB
Toggle pause menu: Esc
Toggle post processing effects (if you have performance issues): F1

This game was created during the GGJ 2019 ("What home means to you") in Leipzig. https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/sweet-home-2

Authorship

Sound design: Maria Schween
Game design: Enrico Schmidt
3D Art: Tobias Dietze
Programming: Steve Harke
Programming: Falk Meyer
